name: Unity CI/CD

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  build:
    name: Build Unity Project
    runs-on: windows-latest  # Use a Windows runner

    steps:
      # Step 1: Checkout the repository
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      # Step 2: Cache Unity files (optional, improves speed)
      - name: Cache Unity files
        uses: actions/cache@v3
        with:
          path: Library
          key: ${{ runner.os }}-unity-library-${{ hashFiles('**/*') }}
          restore-keys: |
            ${{ runner.os }}-unity-library-

      # Step 3: Set up Unity
      - name: Set up Unity
        uses: game-ci/unity-actions/setup@v3
        with:
          unityVersion: 6000.0.24f1  # Replace with your Unity version
          modules: Windows

      # Step 4: Activate Unity license
      - name: Activate Unity license
        uses: game-ci/unity-actions/activate@v3
        with:
          ulfContent: ${{ secrets.UNITY_LICENSE }} # Use the secret where we've stored the .ulf content

      # Step 5: Build the project
      - name: Build project
        uses: game-ci/unity-actions/builder@v3
        with:
          targetPlatform: StandaloneWindows64  # Replace with your platform
          buildName: MyGame  # Name your build
          buildPath: build  # Output folder for the build

      # Step 6: Upload build artifacts
      - name: Upload Build Artifacts
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: GameBuild
          path: build/
